data.sql:
SELECT  
decode( objecttype  
, 0, 'Record'  
, 1, 'Index'  
, 2, decode( objectid2  
                    , 0, 'Field'  
                    , 102, 'Field Label' )  
, 3, 'Field Format'  
, 4, 'Translate'  
, 5, 'Page'  
, 6, 'Menu'  
, 7, 'Component'  
, 8, 'Record PeopleCode'  
, 9, 'Menu PeopleCode'  
, 10, 'Query'  
, 11, 'Tree Structure'  
, 12, 'Tree'  
, 13, 'Access Group'  
, 14, 'Color'  
, 15, 'Style'  
, 16, 'Business Process Map'  
, 17, 'Business Process'  
, 18, 'Activity'  
, 19, 'Role'  
, 20, 'Process Definition'  
, 21, 'Process Server'  
, 22, 'Process Type'  
, 23, 'Process Job'  
, 24, 'Process Recurrence'  
, 25, 'Message Catalog Entry'  
, 26, 'Dimension'  
, 27, 'Cube Definition'  
, 28, 'Cube Instance Definition'  
, 29, 'Business Interlink'  
, 30, 'SQL Object'  
, 31, 'File Layout Definition'  
, 32, 'Component Interface'  
, 33, 'Application Engine Program'  
, 34, 'Application Engine Section'  
, 35, 'Message Node'  
, 36, 'Message Channel'  
, 37, 'Message'  
, 38, 'Approval Rule Set'  
, 39, 'Message PeopleCode'  
, 40, 'Subscription PeopleCode'  
, 41, 'Channel PeopleCode'  
, 42, 'Component Interface PeopleCode'  
, 43, 'Application Engine PeopleCode'  
, 44, 'Page PeopleCode'  
, 45, 'Page Field PeopleCode'  
, 46, 'Component PeopleCode'  
, 47, 'Component Record PeopleCode'  
, 48, 'Component Record Field PeopleCode'  
, 49, 'Image'  
, 50, 'Style Sheet'  
, 51, 'HTML'  
, 52, 'File Reference'  
, 53, 'Permission List'  
, 54, 'Portal Registry Definition'  
, 55, 'Portal Registry Structure' || ' - ' || decode( objectvalue2  
                                                                          , 'C', 'Content Reference'  
                                                                          , 'F', 'Folder' )  
, 56, 'URL Definition'  
, 57, 'Application Package'  
, 58, 'Application Package PeopleCode'  
, 59, 'Portal Registry User homepage'  
, 60, 'Problem Type'  
, 61, 'Archive template'  
, 62, 'XSLT'  
, 63, 'Portal Registry User Favorites'  
, 64, 'Mobile Page'  
, 65, 'Relationship'
, 66, 'Component Interface Property PeopleCode'
, 67, 'Optimization Model'
, 68, 'File Reference'
, 69, 'File Reference Type Code'
, 70, 'Archive Object Definition'
, 71, 'Archive Template (Type 2)'
, 72, 'Diagnostic Plug-in'
, 73, 'Analytic Model' 
, 74, 'Not used'
, 75, 'Java Portlet User Preference'
, 76, 'WSRP Remote Producer'
, 77, 'WSRP Remote Portlet' 
, 78, 'WSRP Cloned Portlet Handle' 
, 79, 'Service' 
, 80, 'Service Operation' 
, 81, 'Service Operation Handler' 
, 82, 'Service Operation Version' 
, 83, 'Service Operation Routing' 
, 84, 'IB Queue'
, 85, 'BIP Template Definition' 
, 86, 'BIP Report Definition' 
, 87, 'BIP File Definition' 
, 88, 'BIP Data Source Definition' 
, 89, 'WSDL' 
, 90, 'Message Schema' 
, 91, 'Connected Query Definition' 
, 92, 'Logical Schema' 
, 93, 'XML Schema' 
, 94, 'Relational Schema' 
, 95, 'Dependency Document' 
, 96, 'Document Schema' 
, 97, 'Essbase Cube Dimension' 
, 98, 'Essbase Cube Outline' 
, 99, 'Essbase Cube Connection' 
, 100, 'Essbase Cube Template'
, 101, 'Delimited Schema' 
, 102, 'Positional Schema' 
, 103, 'Application Data Set Definition' 
, 104, 'Test Definition' 
, 105, 'Test Framework Test Case' 
, 106, 'Application Data Set Binding' 
, 107, 'Feed Definition' 
, 108, 'Feed Categorie' 
, 109, 'Feed Data Type' 
, 110, 'JSON Document' 
, 111, 'Related Content Definition' 
, 112, 'Related Content Service' 
, 113, 'Related Content Configuration' 
, 114, 'Related Content Layout' 
, 115, 'Search Attribute' 
, 116, 'Search Definition' 
, 117, 'Search Categorie' 
, 118, 'Search Context' 
, 119, 'Integration Group') AS "Object Type"  
, CASE objecttype  
   WHEN 1 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - Index ID ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 4 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2 || ' - ' || objectvalue3 || ' - ' || objectvalue4  
   WHEN 8 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2 || '.' || objectvalue3  
   WHEN 9 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue3 || '.' || objectvalue4  
   WHEN 10 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - OprID: ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 12 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2 || ' - ' || objectvalue3 || ' - ' || objectvalue4  
   WHEN 14 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - OprID: ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 20 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 25 THEN objectvalue1 || ', ' || objectvalue2 || ' - ' || objectvalue3  
   WHEN 26 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 27 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 28 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 34 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 35 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 36 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 37 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 38 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 39 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 40 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 42 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 43 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2 || ' - ' || objectvalue3 || ' - ' || objectvalue4  
   WHEN 44 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 45 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2 || '.' || objectvalue3  
   WHEN 46 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2 || '.' || objectvalue3  
   WHEN 47 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2 || '.' || objectvalue3 || '.' || objectvalue4  
   WHEN 48 THEN objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2 || '.' || objectvalue3 || '.' || TRANSLATE( objectvalue4, ' ' , '.' )  
   WHEN 52 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - Path: ' || objectvalue2  
   WHEN 55 THEN objectvalue3  
   WHEN 57 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2 || '-' || objectvalue3  
   WHEN 58 THEN objectvalue1 || ':' || objectvalue2 || '.OnExecute'  
   WHEN 63 THEN objectvalue1 || ' - ' || objectvalue2 || ' - ' || decode( objectvalue3, 'L', 'Fav. Folder', 'V' , 'Favorite' ) || ' - ' || objectvalue4  
   ELSE objectvalue1 || '.' || objectvalue2 || '.' || objectvalue3 || '.' || objectvalue4  
   END AS "PeopleSoft Object Name" 
, decode( upgradeaction, 
              0 , 'Copy', 
              1 , 'Delete', 
              2 , 'None', 
              3 , 'CopyProp' ) AS "Mod Type"
, decode( takeaction, 
              0 , 'N', 
              1 , 'Y' ) AS "Upgrade" 
, decode( COPYDONE, 
              0 , 'N', 
              1 , 'Y' ) AS "Done"
, OBJECTVALUE1  
, OBJECTVALUE2  
, OBJECTVALUE3  
, OBJECTVALUE4  
, OBJECTTYPE  
FROM psprojectitem  
WHERE PROJECTNAME = :1
ORDER BY 1

data.description: Check for first characters of various elements
data.sql:
SELECT 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2,  
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4, 
  A.OBJECTTYPE 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A  
WHERE 
  A.PROJECTNAME = :1 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 0 
  AND EXISTS ( 
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
       PSRECDEFN P 
    WHERE 
      P.RECNAME=A.OBJECTVALUE1 
      AND %Substring(P.RECNAME, 1, :2) <> %Substring(:3, 1, :2) 
      AND P.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' ) 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4, 
  A.OBJECTTYPE 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A  
 WHERE 
    A.PROJECTNAME = :1 
    AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 2 
    AND EXISTS ( 
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSFLDDEFN P 
    WHERE 
      P.FLDDEFNNAME = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
      AND %Substring(P.FLDDEFNNAME, 1, :2) <> %Substring(:3, 1, :2) 
      AND P.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' ) 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4, 
  A.OBJECTTYPE 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A  
WHERE 
  A.PROJECTNAME = :1 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 5 
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSPNLDEFN P 
    WHERE 
      P.PNLNAME = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
      AND %Substring(P.PNLNAME, 1, :2) <> %Substring(:3, 1, :2) 
      AND P.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' ) 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4, 
  A.OBJECTTYPE 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A 
WHERE 
  A.PROJECTNAME = :1 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 7 
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSPNLGRPDEFN P 
    WHERE 
      P.PNLGRPNAME = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
      AND %Substring(P.PNLGRPNAME, 1, :2) <> %Substring(:3, 1, :2) 
      AND P.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' ) 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4,  
  A.OBJECTTYPE 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A 
WHERE 
  A.PROJECTNAME = :1 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 6 
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSMENUDEFN P 
    WHERE 
      P.MENUNAME = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
      AND %Substring(P.MENUNAME, 1, :2) <> %Substring(:3, 1, :2) 
      AND P.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' ) 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2,  
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4, 
  A.OBJECTTYPE 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A 
WHERE 
  A.PROJECTNAME = :1 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 31 
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 
      'X'
    FROM 
      PSFLDDEFN P 
    WHERE 
      P.FLDDEFNNAME = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
      AND %Substring(P.FLDDEFNNAME, 1, :2) <> %Substring(:3, 1, :2) 
      AND P.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' ) 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2,  
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4, 
  A.OBJECTTYPE 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A 
WHERE 
  A.PROJECTNAME = :1 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 33 
  AND EXISTS ( 
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSAEAPPLDEFN P 
    WHERE 
      P.AE_APPLID = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
      AND %Substring(P.AE_APPLID, 1, :2) <> %Substring(:3, 1, :2) 
      AND P.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' ) 
UNION ALL 
SELECT 
  A.OBJECTVALUE1, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE2, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE3, 
  A.OBJECTVALUE4, 
  A.OBJECTTYPE 
FROM 
  PSPROJECTITEM A 
WHERE 
  A.PROJECTNAME =:1 
  AND A.OBJECTTYPE = 49 
  AND EXISTS ( 
    SELECT 
      'X' 
    FROM 
      PSCONTDEFN P 
    WHERE 
      P.CONTNAME = A.OBJECTVALUE1 
      AND %Substring(P.CONTNAME, 1, :2) <> %Substring(:3, 1, :2) 
      AND P.LASTUPDOPRID <> 'PPLSOFT' )
data.notes:
OBJECTYPE = 0 --> Records
                       2 --> Fields
                       5 --> Pages
                       7 --> Components
                       6 --> Menus
                     31 --> File layout definitions
                     33 --> Application Engine Programs
                     49 --> Images
